Vol.:(0123456789)
Correction to: Effects of animal handling on striatal DAT availability in rats
Seunghyeon Shin1 · Keunyoung Kim2 · Kyoungjune Pak2  · Hyun‑Yeol Nam1 · Hyung‑Jun Im3 · Myung Jun Lee4 · Seong‑Jang Kim5 · In Joo Kim2

sections.heading: Published online: 6 May 2023 © The Japanese Society of Nuclear Medicine 2023
sections.text:
Correction to: Annals of Nuclear Medicine (2020) 34:496–501 https://doi.org/10.1007/s12149-020-01476-5
In the original publication of the article, the affiliation of “Kyoungjune Pak, Keunyoung Kim, In Joo Kim” should be corrected as “Department of Nuclear Medicine and Biomedical Research Institute, Pusan National University Hospital
and School of Medicine, Pusan National University, Busan, Republic of Korea”.
Data availability Not applicable to this.
Publisher's Note Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
Kyoungjune Pak, Hyun-Yeol Nam and In Joo Kim contributed equally as corresponding authors.
The original article can be found online at https:// doi. org/ 10. 1007/ s12149- 020- 01476-5.

title: Correction to: Effects of animal handling on striatal DAT availability in rats
